example.parse: (IP (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 安理会)) (VP (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VV 应) (VP (VP (VV 履行) (NP-OBJ (NN 承诺))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 解除) (NP-OBJ (PP (P 对) (NP-PN (NR 伊))) (NP (NN 制裁))))))))

(IP (NP-SBJ (CP-APP (IP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VSB (VV 流血) (VV 输出)))) (CC 或) (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 订单)) (VP (VV 流失)))) (DEC 的)) (NP (NN 忧虑))) (VP (ADVP (AD 才)) (VP (VV 能) (VP (ADVP (AD 真正)) (VP (VV 解除))))))
